channel.title: Can anyone help me add a make-over mage?
channel.description:
I really want to add a Make-Over Mage to change the looks of all characters etc like the real Runescape one.
Anybody know the code or anything that could help me? :)
I know that you can force the player model looks in the config stuff but i'd like a mage to change them. If i spawn the make over mage you cannot talk to him.
Thanks alot :D
